Factsheet

Release date:

Regular Price:

Description

A young pig with a strong imagination explores a bizarre daydream, coming up against platforming challenges and avoiding the dreaded Pixel Pig!

History

Features

  • Classic platforming sidescroller!
  • Use your Oink ability to bring down the wretched Pixel Pig, your imaginary enemy!
  • Avoid certain death in three environments, jumping from a repetitive dungeon to a Greek hideaway!
  • Meet Dimension Mouse, aka Derek, and uncover his darkest secret!
